column2: Refused to give daughter to the Acllahuasi
Asked me to change my voting pattern
Asked me to support them as Grand Chancellor
Asked me to give them my spot on the council
Pleased me and my fellow eunuchs
Displeased me and my fellow eunuchs
Refused to increase my tributary tier
Refused to lower my tributary tier
Refused mt offer to increase their tributary tier
Helped me become a better Hwarang
Refused to give me spiritual guidance
Did not let me join the Hwarang
Did not cede the Sixteen Prefectures
Let me join the Treasure Fleet
Did not let me join the Treasure Fleet
